snippet: Coach Mike Woodson spent a significant portion of practice impersonating LeBron James, who will lead the Heat into Madison Square Garden for the Knicks’ season opener Friday night.
abstract: New York Knicks coach Mike Woodson spends significant portion of practice preparing to defend against LeBron James as Knicks host Miami Heat in season home opener.
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike Woodson spent a significant portion of practice impersonating LeBron James, who will lead the Heat into Madison Square Garden for the Knicks’ season opener Friday night.

headline.seo: Knicks’ Woodson Keeps Focus on Defending Heat’s James
headline.main: Woodson Keeps Focus on Defending James
headline.print_headline: Woodson Keeps Focus On Defending James
